result.title: Report on the consolidated SMART-plant scenarios, market value of SMART-Product portfolio and finalized product applications
result.description: Based on the target portfolio of recovered resources the key applications for maximizing value are reported to guide strategy of future licensors and potential opportunities. All pillars: Construction, Additives, Construction and Intermediates, as described in Section 2 of the DoA, will be considered as final applications.

result.title: Start-up, troubleshooting, operation and long-term validation report of the Downstream SMARTechs
result.description:
Downstream SMARTechs report from the start-up to the long term validation which include the following 2 interim sections
The interim 1, delivered to the coordinator at Month 30, will include: (1) technical and practical guidelines on the start-up and troubleshooting; (2) data trends and detailed mass balances (monthly or weekly basis). Input data for the activities of WP4 and WP5 will be included and commented as well. Lead: UBRUN
The section 2, delivered at M39, include mass balances and performances more than 1 year operation of the Downstream SMARTechs; technological validation according to the ETV pilot program; detailed characterstics of the final recovered products. The report will even include definitive data supplied within the project for the activities of WP4 and WP5.

result.title: Motor function restoration in PD mice by GPe optogenetic neuromodulation
result.description: Motor function restoration in PD mice by optogenetic manipulation of the external globus pallidus (GPe) (M24): Identification of a novel target (selective GPe neuronal population) to restore motor function in a 6-OHDA PD mouse model. Validation of the target on motor behavior and neuronal activity.

result.title: Dissemination and Communication plan
result.description:
The Dissemination and Communication Plan has the purpose to guide Communication and Dissemination initiatives taking place in parallel at different levels and is strongly tied up with the Data Management Plan.
The Dissemination and Communication Plan will be regularly reviewed and updated if needed, upon input of the Coordinator or of the Strategic Committee.
